title: Le surfeur sans limites (The surfer without limits)
itunes:title: Le surfeur sans limites (The surfer without limits)
description:
Eric Dargent devoted his life to surfing — the bigger the waves, the better. He wouldn’t let anything get in his way of his passion, not even a life-altering shark attack. After losing half of his leg, he set out to pursue a new dream, for himself and countless others.

Study materials and a transcript of this episode are available at https://bit.ly/3r2QU9t.
